attributes.additional_details:
im setting up this petition to show that we will not be forced in to rent and council tax increases!
we are now finding its pay rent or eat !
so many people are struggerling how are we expected to pay more, when our wages are the same?
i for one want the goverment to look into the price hikes and fix rents, because it seems to be every year there is a price hike!
also council tax, it should be capped for social housing!
its social for a reason, because WE CANT afford high rates to rent or buy!
